# Dhanam Ledger

> Comprehensive budget and wealth tracking application with ESG crypto insights, targeting LATAM-first users with multilingual support (English/Spanish).

- Production URLs: app.dhan.am (web), api.dhan.am (API), admin.dhan.am (admin)
- Part of the MADFAM ecosystem — uses Janua for auth (OIDC SSO) and Enclii for deployment (bare metal K8s)
- Stack: Next.js 15/16, React Native + Expo, NestJS (Fastify), PostgreSQL (Prisma), Redis (BullMQ)
- Monorepo: Turborepo + pnpm — 4 apps, 6 packages
- API: 32 fully implemented modules with Swagger docs
- Test coverage: 80%+ across the codebase
- License: AGPL-3.0

## Architecture Decision Records

- [ADR-001: NestJS with Fastify](https://github.com/madfam-org/dhanam/blob/main/docs/adr/001-nestjs-fastify.md): Chose Fastify over Express for 5x faster JSON serialization
- [ADR-002: Prisma ORM](https://github.com/madfam-org/dhanam/blob/main/docs/adr/002-prisma-orm.md): Schema-first ORM with type-safe client and Decimal precision for financial data
- [ADR-003: Multi-Provider Strategy](https://github.com/madfam-org/dhanam/blob/main/docs/adr/003-multi-provider-strategy.md): Provider orchestration with failover for Belvo, Plaid, Bitso, Zapper, Zillow
- [ADR-004: Janua Auth Integration](https://github.com/madfam-org/dhanam/blob/main/docs/adr/004-janua-auth-integration.md): MADFAM SSO via OIDC with TOTP 2FA and token rotation
- [ADR-005: Enclii Deployment](https://github.com/madfam-org/dhanam/blob/main/docs/adr/005-enclii-deployment.md): Auto-deploy to bare metal K8s with zero-downtime rolling updates
